settings.title: About At Therapy
settings.content:
At Therapy Limited is one of New Zealand's leading stockists and distributors of quality hand therapy, 
physio and sports rehabilitation products. We have a wide selection of braces, splints, splinting materials and other orthotic devices. 
 
Located in Rosedale, Auckland, we have a large warehouse filled with exceptional products designed to help hand therapists and physios treat a range of clinical conditions.

settings.title: 100% Guarantee
settings.content: We pride ourselves on providing friendly, exceptional customer service. If at any time, you're not happy with the products delivered, we provide an easy return and refund system. We're here to help.

settings.mega_bottom_bar_text: Get in touch, if you have any questions or queries about any products in our range

settings.title: Our Vision
settings.content: Emporium continues to be a meeting point between sustainability and selection, showcasing thoughtfully curated products for your home. We dedicate ourselves to providing you with a large selection of carefully curated items that prove their worth and hold a purpose.

settings.newsletter_text: Stay up to date with all At Therapy promotions, specials, product and brand updates, upcoming workshop information.

settings.text: NEW ZEALAND PREFERRED MEDICAL SUPPLY COMPANY. NEW ZEALAND OWNED AND OPERATED

settings.not_found_text:
We're sorry, but the product or page you requested could not be found.
It may be that the web address is incorrect or perhaps the product or page you requested is no longer available.

Try searching or continue shopping.

settings.title: Apply for an Account
settings.content_text: We’re here to answer any questions or comments you may have! Fill out our contact form and we will try our best to get back to you in 24 hours or less. You can also take a look at our FAQs to see if your question already has an answer!

settings.title: Where do I return a product for a refund?
settings.answer: Our policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have gone by since your purchase, unfortunately we can’t offer you a refund or exchange. To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and re-saleable in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging. To complete your return, please call us and we will supply a refund number that you can supply with your returned item. We require a receipt or proof of purchase.

settings.title: Do you exchange products if they don't suit?
settings.answer: We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at info@attherapy.co.nz and we will supply you with an exchange/returns reference number.

settings.title: Do you have a link to your returns, refunds and exchange policy?
settings.answer: Yes we do. Find all the info here

settings.title: How do I apply for an Account?
settings.answer: Visit this page and complete the form. We'll be in touch with confirmation of you account and send you an email with access to the website.

settings.title: What are your account terms?
settings.answer: You can find all our terms of trade and account terms here

settings.title: When will my order arrive?
settings.answer: Standard shipping time is 1-3 business days. We use NZ Couriers to ship all products. We ship from Albany, Auckland weekdays. All orders are dispatched in the weekday afternoons.

settings.title: How much is shipping?
settings.answer: We offer a standard rate of $9.50 for all items shipped within New Zealand. For any orders over $100, we offer Free Shipping. Bulky items will incur a $20 charge.

settings.title: I have a question about my order, what should I do?
settings.answer:
Please contact us.
Phone: +64 9 869 3799
Free phone: 0800 81 99 22
Email: info@attherapy.co.nz
We will be happy to help.

settings.title: I can't see prices of products. Why is this?
settings.answer: To see product prices, you require an account and a website log in. To apply for an account, please visit this page and complete the form. Once approved, we will provide web access to you via email.

settings.title: My log in doesn't work. What shall I do?
settings.answer:
If you have an account and accessed the website before, you may need to reset your password. You can reset your password here

A new link will be sent to your email account for you to reset your password. You can then log in to your account.

If you need further assistance, please contact us.
